backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with storage and authorization mixins, hardcoded admin credentials, session management, and many content-related data types.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of numerous frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, global providers, and the landing page layout with section components and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the bilingual About section with text, stats, icons, and fade‑in animations using the language context.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Displays an admin access-denied message with navigation buttons for home and login.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentBlo: Admin UI for creating content blocks with text, images, ordering, and visibility settings, including upload handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/Diagnostic: Runs a sequence of admin diagnostics including auth checks and CRUD tests on products, updating UI status for each step.
frontend/src/components/admin/HowToOrder: Manages creation and editing of How-To-Order steps with image uploads and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/InstagramF: Allows admins to configure Instagram feed settings including handle, embed code, titles, descriptions, and visibility.
frontend/src/components/admin/PackagesMa: Provides UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting packages with image upload support.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductsMa: Handles CRUD operations for products including editing details and uploading images via a dialog interface.
frontend/src/components/admin/SectionsMa: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting content sections with image/background upload and visibility controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Admin interface to view existing admin users and create new ones via a dialog form.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: A contact form component with name, email, and message fields that uses translations and displays a success toast on submit.
Fetches and renders dynamically loaded sections and content blocks with multilingual text and optional background or images.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A footer with brand info, contact links, quick navigation buttons, and language-based text content.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with scroll detection, navigation buttons, mobile menu, language toggle, and admin navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, floating decorative elements, translated titles, and buttons that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/HowToOrder.tsx: Displays a multi-step ordering guide using translated text and icons, with smooth-scroll to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/InstagramFeed.ts: Fetches Instagram feed config and renders either an embed, profile link, or fallback message with localized text.
frontend/src/components/Packages.tsx: Shows a grid of predefined package cards with images, tags, and translated names/descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Renders a large grid of product cards using static product data and localized fields.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides language state, translation function, and a large dictionary of English/Spanish UI strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Handles admin session login, validation, and logout using the backend actor and session storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login flow, identity loading, and related state utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, products, packages, and admin-related content via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode theming, animations, and Instagram embed styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard UI with authentication checks, navigation, logout, and content-management panels.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Implements the admin login form with session validation, error handling, and navigation on success.
frontend/src/utils/adminSessionStorage.t: Provides helpers to store, retrieve, and clear the admin session ID in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current plan to replace Internet Identity with custom username/password auth stored in Supabase, including admin‑only access, RLS rules, and pending feature requests. Lists existing features, known issues, and architectural notes guiding the migration.
